author: Surabhi Agarwal
title: Govt waives off four months rent for IT units operating out of software tech parks
description: Union minister of electronics and IT, Ravi Shankar Prasad said in a tweet, "IT units/ startups operating from 60 STPI Centers across India have been granted waiver from paying rental for period between 01.03.2020 and 30.06.2020. This will benefit nearly 200 s…
content: New Delhi: In what will come as a huge relief to IT and ITeS companies operating out of Software Technology Parks of India, the government on Thursday has decided to waive off the rent being paid by these units till June -- that is for a period of four months… [+1075 chars]
